creator: drmop
descriptionHtml:
WARNING: Very addictive idle tapping cookie clicker

Incredibly addictive, fun simple cookie clicker, 400+ achievements, upgrades, modifications and powerups, powerful free daily bonuses, minigame boosters, offline cookie mining and evolution boosts.

The year is 2030 and the new world currency is cookies. You are tasked with saving a dying world by baking cookies to halt and reverse the effects of climate change and global warming. Build, upgrade and modify better buildings and helpers that reduce carbon dioxide levels and increase your cookie production to boot.

- Free to play, you never have to spend a penny to play and progress
- Simple and very addictive auto incremental upgrade style game play
- Bake cookies by clicking on the cookie moon, use cookies to purchase items and buildings that help the climate and produce more cookies.
- Use cookies to buy over 200 upgrades and mods to speed up carbon reduction and cookie production.
- Unlock over 200 achievements.
- Use powerups to speed cookie cooking production.
- Evolve your cookie mastery to gain extra benefits and unlock new minigame boosters. Also supports multi-evo, evolve up to 4 times in one go and save massive amounts of cookies.
- Daily bonus rewards and daily bonus mini-games.
- Login with Facebook, invite friends, share progress, compete with friends in the cookie master leaderboards and send cookie boost mini-game gifts to friends.
- Offline cookie cooking, play even whilst you are away.
- Random blessings boost your play.
- Deal with random curses such as striking workers, maintenance shut downs and more.
- Endless addicting game play
- Backup, restore and transfer game data between devices including desktop
- Supported on both phone and tablet.
- No wifi? Don’t worry, play Cookie Clicker Save the World anytime, anywhere
- Raising awareness of how mankind affects the environment.
- Inspired by the original and arguably the best cookie clicker game every created by Orteil
descriptionShort: The great cookie god has challenged you, do you have enough sugar hero?

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Added more ways of generating cookies and coins
Re-balanced economy
Bug fixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Made free card available without evolution
Added 100 coins purchase to coins shop
Hilo mini game appears in evolution 1 instead of 2
Memory mini game appears in evolution 2 instead of 3
Munch mini game appears in evolution 3 instead of 4
Pole mini game appears in evolution 4 instead of 5
